description: This Dart source file defines a utility class 'AppTransitions' providing reusable animation and page transition widgets for a Flutter project. It includes standard duration and curve constants, transition builders like fadeScale and slideFade, and methods for creating page routes with consistent animations across the app.

classes.name: AppTransitions
classes.description: A utility class providing standardized animation durations, curves, and transition builders for page and widget transitions in a Flutter app.

methods.name: fadeScale
methods.description: Creates a transition builder that combines fade and scale animations for widgets, useful with AnimatedSwitcher.

methods.name: slideFade
methods.description: Creates a transition builder that combines slide and fade animations from a specified offset for widgets.

methods.name: materialSlideFadeRoute
methods.description: Generates a PageRoute with a fade+slide transition, simulating material design page transitions.

methods.name: cupertinoFadeRoute
methods.description: Generates a PageRoute with a fade transition similar to Cupertino-style page navigation.

methods.name: fadeThrough
methods.description: Provides a fade transition widget intended for lightweight overlays, combining an animation with a fade effect.
